input.sentences: the show we saw when we were on vacation was great .
there were so many disney tales being told on stage .
afterward they all got up together for an encore .
we all had a great time there .
output.sentences: The kids enjoyed the Disney show we attended.
The characters told tales on the stage.
The encore afterwards got everone pumped up.
Minnie came out to tell us all it was time to end the show, and wished us a safe trip home.
